exceptions.message:
Client error: `POST https://c17edef9514920c1d2a6aeaf9066b150:***@mall-hello.myshopify.com/admin/customers/6290104001/metafields.json` resulted in a `422 Unprocessable Entity` response:
{"errors":{"value":["can't be blank"]}}

hints: Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table

statements.sql: insert into "customers" ("accepts_marketing", "addresses", "created_at", "default_address", "email", "phone", "first_name", "customer_id", "metafield", "multipass_identifier", "last_name", "last_order_id", "last_order_name", "network_id", "note", "orders_count", "state", "tags", "tax_exempt", "total_spent", "updated_at", "verified_email") values ('1', '[]', '2017-08-15 08:13:23', '', 'hemaveo16@hotmail.com', '', 'HEIDY MARYORI VELASQUEZ OCHOA', '6290104001', '', '', 'hemaveo16@hotmail.com', '', '', '1', '', '0', 'disabled', '', '0', '0.00', '2017-08-15 08:13:23', '1') returning "id"
select * from "terceros" where "terceros"."deleted_at" is null and "email" = 'hemaveo16@hotmail.com'
hints: Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table

statements.sql: insert into "terceros" ("nombres", "apellidos", "email", "usuario", "contraseña", "tipo_id", "customer_id", "network_id", "updated_at", "created_at") values ('HEIDY MARYORI VELASQUEZ OCHOA', 'hemaveo16@hotmail.com', 'hemaveo16@hotmail.com', 'hemaveo16@hotmail.com', 'yWjER2nvQMhf2zsHhVPry..ZslE.8G9Hd9aC0hpuPI964kS86raeO', '1', '6290104001', '1', '2017-08-15 13:13:23', '2017-08-15 13:13:23') returning "id"
select * from "terceros" where "terceros"."deleted_at" is null and "email" = 'hemaveo16@hotmail.com' and "state" = '1' limit 1
hints: Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

statements.sql: select * from "terceros" where "terceros"."deleted_at" is null and "terceros"."id" = '158435' limit 1
